About me

I'm a young developer! I love coding games and experiment in unity, I also like learning and share with others. Here you will only see my finished game/experiment, but I also make website and little programs in python.

I want to create my own game studio and make bigger projects with a team!

View Resume Projects

Projects

Memories

2023

It's a platformer where you help a witch find their lost power, I made it for the Valentine's Day, I made the character, so she looks like my girlfriend, I made everything alone with some downloaded assets, it took me 2 weeks, I'm proud of this, maybe because she really like it!

Tarogue

2022

It's a vampire survivor like, you need to survive to kill a boss and gain money to upgrade your character powers. This game took 4 months of Team Work. I made it with a 2D artist and we both designed the game.

Itch.io

Splashy clone

2022

I try to challenge myself to make a game in 48h, it's a clone of splashy, an Hyper casual Game. I used DOTween for the animation.

Red Hood Platformer

2021

It's a platformer with fun controls like dash and double jump, you have to kill monster on your way to get informations about this world. This game took me 2 weeks of solo dev, I made it from scratch on Unity. This was my first story game!

King's Game

2021

It's a multiplayer top down game made with Mirror Networking on Unity.This prototype took me 2 days to create, there is 4 room, each one private to a player, player can also fight together and fight monster.

Stack Shape

2020

my last published game, a physic based game where you need to balance some shape to stack all of them and go to the next level! I made this game with my girlfriend, she made all the art, and I focused on the programming. I made it with Unity in C# and we got some nice review on Google play!

Google Play Github

Water Shader

2020

I tried to make a water shader with reflection and bloom on the light, a fun little experience to start with the shader graph of Unity.

Wold3D

2020

This is a school project, we made a raycast engine in C without library, we were 2 on this project, I add some teleporter to our game to add a non euclidean feeling, it works really well. We got all the points and the bonus points !

GitHub

Mini Tank

2019

My first published game! Made with Unity, I made the art and the programming, it's still available on google play, my journey in game dev started with this game!
